p1-ea: These are your claims for specialist equipment costs. Only claims made through this portal will appear on this page. It can take up to 5 working days for a claim to appear here.
p1-av: These are your claims for an adaptation to a vehicle costs. Only claims made through this portal will appear on this page. It can take up to 5 working days for a claim to appear here.
p1-sw: These are your claims for support worker costs. Only claims made through this portal will appear on this page. It can take up to 5 working days for a claim to appear here.
p1-tw: These are your claims for travel to or from work costs. Only claims made through this portal will appear on this page. It can take up to 5 working days for a claim to appear here.
p1-tiw: These are your claims for travel during work costs. Only claims made through this portal will appear on this page. It can take up to 5 working days for a claim to appear here.
p1-none-ea: You do not have any claims for specialist equipment costs in your claims history. If you've sent a new claim, it can take up to 5 working days for it to appear on this page.
